name: Name
title: Title
about_me_abstract: I graduated from Kahramanmaraş Sütçü İmam University Computer Engineering Department in 2020 with first place. I especially do projects in the fields of data science and web development and try to improve myself. I am a person who likes to research, can easily adapt to innovations and can work with different technologies. My interests; artificial intelligence, machine learning, deep learning, computer vision, natural language processing and data mining.
resume_description: I am constantly trying to improve myself by continuing to learn. Below is my education and work history.
services_description: I usually do research on artificial intelligence, machine learning and deep learning. I also develop web-based projects.
my_skills_description: I am a person who likes to work with different technologies and is constantly learning. Below are the technologies I usually use.
projects_description: Some of the projects I have developed are listed here. Please contact me for detailed information.
blog_description: I think that knowledge will spread and gain meaning as it is shared. In line with my computer science and interests, I will share my knowledge with you through this field.
open_to_work_message: Outside of working hours, I develop projects as a freelance on weekends and weekday evenings. Please contact me for the projects you want to do.
contact_description: Please contact me with your questions, suggestions and job offers.
subject: Subject
site_info: Hello, I am Suat Bayır, a computer engineer. I do research in the field of computer science and share my knowledge through this site.

about_author: I graduated from Kahramanmaraş Sütçü İmam University Computer Engineering Department in 2020 with first place. I have been developing projects on Data Science and Web Development for over 3 years. I am someone who likes to research, adapts easily to innovations and likes to work with different technologies.

dakik_iotiq.title: Computer Engineer
dakik_iotiq.text: I am working as a research and development engineer at Dakik Software. I am constantly learning new things to develop state-of-the-art products and I am happy as I learn.

tsoft_full.title: R&D Engineer, Full Time
tsoft_full.text: I worked on the development of machine learning and deep learning methods for the development of a data mining and business intelligence product called Smartydata, writing Restful API and writing the frontend side as SPA.

bachelor.title: Computer Engineering
bachelor.text: During my 4-year undergraduate education, I worked a lot and finished the department with the first place. As a graduation project, I developed a deep learning-based computer vision project and provided autonomous vehicle control.

master.title: Informatics, Master Degree
master.text: Within the scope of my master's education, I am researching on metaheuristic optimization algorithms and working on a new metaheuristic optimization algorithm.

tsoft_part.title: R&D Engineer, Part Time
tsoft_part.text: I started working part-time in the 4th year of my undergraduate education. I was going to work and college together. In this process, I had the chance to reinforce the knowledge I learned at the academy with what I learned in the industry.

high.title: High School
high.text: I completed my high school education in Iskenderun, Hatay. Spending a lot of time with computers in high school played a big role in my study in Computer Engineering. I still miss my high school days.
